works.title: My different works
works.subtitle: You can find a list of my projects below. I did some of them during my training at The Hacking Project, and others are personal projects.
works.content: Since the start of 2020, I have been learning web development thanks to The Hacking Project. I was able to learn how to use Ruby, Rails, Javascript and React
works.choice: Make a choice to display the different elements!
